description: Unit tests for LogEntryService class, testing creation and listing of log entries in the devdiary backend application.

classes.name: LogEntryServiceTest
classes.description: Test class for LogEntryService with test methods for creating and listing log entries.

methods.name: create_persistsEntry_forUser
methods.description: Tests that creating a log entry for a user persists the entry and returns correct response.

methods.name: listMine_returnsPagedEntries
methods.description: Tests that listing user-specific log entries returns a paged response with correct data.
